Comment: Freight rail has some of the lowest emission per distance traveled and account for less than 1% of our total yearly carbon emission, so the impact on climate is negligible.   This really will however greatly impact the health of rural and poor communities that live near train tracks, all for the reason of saving the train companies a couple million dollars.
